==Summary==
Allen & Unwin received a question from a [[cats|cat]] breeder who wanted to name her Siamese cats after characters in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. Tolkien was never a cat person, and considered Siamese cats to belong to the fauna of [[Mordor]].
==Note==
The letter was wrongly dated 14 October in ''The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien''.<ref name=HS/>
